title: Sleep Calculator
description: Calculate your ideal sleep schedule based on sleep cycles
metaDescription: Free sleep calculator - Find out when you should go to bed or wake up to optimize your sleep cycles. Calculate ideal sleep times based on 90-minute cycles.

form.title: Plan your sleep
form.modeBedtime: When should I go to bed?
form.bedtimeHelper: Select the time you plan to go to bed
form.wakeupHelper: Select the time you need to wake up

results.title: Your sleep schedule
results.wakeupSubtitle: If you go to bed at {time}, you should wake up at one of these times:
results.bedtimeSubtitle: If you want to wake up at {time}, you should go to bed at one of these times:
